source.title: A Telescope in the Desert Reached Back a Billion Years and Uncovered Something Incredible - Yahoo
source.name: Yahoo Entertainment

facts: A telescope in the desert reached back a billion years
The discovery was made possible by advanced technology and equipment

neutral.headline: Telescope in Desert Reaches Back Billion Years, Uncovers Something Incredible
neutral.body_html: A telescope located in a desert has achieved an incredible feat by reaching back one billion years into the universe's history. The advanced technology and equipment used made this discovery possible.
